trans-unit.source: Using the NuGet Service Bus Package
trans-unit.target: Using the NuGet Service Bus Package

trans-unit.source: Using the NuGet Service Bus Package
trans-unit.target: Using the NuGet Service Bus Package

trans-unit.source: The <token>sb1</token> NuGet package is the easiest way to reference <token>sb2</token> APIs and to configure your application with all of the <token>sb2</token> dependencies.
trans-unit.target: The <token>sb1</token> NuGet package is the easiest way to reference <token>sb2</token> APIs and to configure your application with all of the <token>sb2</token> dependencies.

trans-unit.source: Install the NuGet Package Manager
trans-unit.target: Install the NuGet Package Manager

trans-unit.source: NuGet is a Visual Studio extension that makes it easy to install and update libraries and tools in Visual Studio and Visual Studio Express.
trans-unit.target: NuGet is a Visual Studio extension that makes it easy to install and update libraries and tools in Visual Studio and Visual Studio Express.

trans-unit.source: To install NuGet, visit <externalLink><linkText>http://www.nuget.org</linkText><linkUri>http://www.nuget.org</linkUri></externalLink>, and click <ui>Install NuGet</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To install NuGet, visit <externalLink><linkText>http://www.nuget.org</linkText><linkUri>http://www.nuget.org</linkUri></externalLink>, and click <ui>Install NuGet</ui>.

trans-unit.source: You are directed to the latest download for the NuGet Package Manager.
trans-unit.target: You are directed to the latest download for the NuGet Package Manager.

trans-unit.source: Click the appropriate link for the version you want to download, and when prompted, click <ui>Open</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Click the appropriate link for the version you want to download, and when prompted, click <ui>Open</ui>.

trans-unit.source: This installs the Visual Studio extension.
trans-unit.target: This installs the Visual Studio extension.

trans-unit.source: If you have Visual Studio or Visual Studio Express running, you are prompted to restart the application in order to complete the installation.
trans-unit.target: If you have Visual Studio or Visual Studio Express running, you are prompted to restart the application in order to complete the installation.

trans-unit.source: Add the Azure Service Bus package to your project
trans-unit.target: Add the Azure Service Bus package to your project

trans-unit.source: The <token>sb2</token> libraries are bundled into a NuGet package.
trans-unit.target: The <token>sb2</token> libraries are bundled into a NuGet package.

trans-unit.source: When you add the NuGet package to a project within Visual Studio, it adds the latest version of the <token>sb2</token> libraries to your project, adds the necessary assembly references, and modifies your configuration file (or adds one if it did not previously exist) to add all known <token>sb2</token> extensions.
trans-unit.target: When you add the NuGet package to a project within Visual Studio, it adds the latest version of the <token>sb2</token> libraries to your project, adds the necessary assembly references, and modifies your configuration file (or adds one if it did not previously exist) to add all known <token>sb2</token> extensions.

trans-unit.source: Complete the following steps to add the <token>sb2</token> NuGet package to your project:
trans-unit.target: Complete the following steps to add the <token>sb2</token> NuGet package to your project:

trans-unit.source: In <ui>Solution Explorer</ui>, right-click on the <ui>References</ui> directory and click <ui>Manage NuGet Packages</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In <ui>Solution Explorer</ui>, right-click on the <ui>References</ui> directory and click <ui>Manage NuGet Packages</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Manage NuGet Packages</ui> dialog, click the <ui>Online</ui> tab.
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Manage NuGet Packages</ui> dialog, click the <ui>Online</ui> tab.

trans-unit.source: In the search query box, type <userInput>Service Bus</userInput> and then click <ui>Enter</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In the search query box, type <userInput>Service Bus</userInput> and then click <ui>Enter</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the results list, select <legacyBold>Microsoft Azure Service Bus</legacyBold> and click the <ui>Install</ui> button.
trans-unit.target: In the results list, select <legacyBold>Microsoft Azure Service Bus</legacyBold> and click the <ui>Install</ui> button.

trans-unit.source: The package will be added to your project.
trans-unit.target: The package will be added to your project.

trans-unit.source: Click the <ui>Close</ui> button to close the <ui>Manage NuGet Packages</ui> dialog.
trans-unit.target: Click the <ui>Close</ui> button to close the <ui>Manage NuGet Packages</ui> dialog.

trans-unit.source: If your Visual Studio solution includes multiple projects, you must add the package to each project separately.
trans-unit.target: If your Visual Studio solution includes multiple projects, you must add the package to each project separately.
